verses.roman:
rasa-gaṇa-madhye tumi śreṣṭha māna' kāya?
'ādya eva paro rasaḥ'--kahe upādhyāya

synonyms: rasa-gaṇa-madhye—among all the mellows; tumi—you; śreṣṭha—as supreme; māna'-accept; kāya—which one; ādyaḥ—conjugal love; eva—certainly; paraḥ rasaḥ—the best of all mellows; kahe—replied; upādhyāya—Raghupati Upādhyāya.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu asked, "Among all the mellows, which do you consider best?" Raghupati Upādhyāya replied, "The mellow of conjugal love is supermost."
